summary: A look at the global culture and appeal of the LEGO building-block toys.
cast: Jason Bateman|Jamie Berard|Bryan Bonahoom|Alice Finch|Bret Harris|Iain Clifford Heath|Dwight Howard|Cody Hughes|G.W. Krauss|Dan Legoff|David Pagano|Nathan Sawaya|Jeff Viens|Brian Whitaker
title: A Lego Brickumentary
